message.reason: Cannot embed PDF document "%1" as a nested topic.
message.response: Change your DITA map so that the topicref that embeds the PDF is not the child of a topicref that points to a DITA resource.

message.reason: Cannot embed PDF document "%1" because embedded PDFs currently don't work with map-based page sequence generation.
message.response: Set the 'map-based-page-sequence-generation' variable to 'false()' in your PDF plugin stylesheet.
